• OpenERP import tool that's FAST

    User guide

    Download Speed Import

    Use it on: Local machine or Server

    Pre-requisites

    • Linux, Solaris, OS X (not tested, but it should work)
    • Working OpenERP 7
    • Python, Postgresql

    Installation

    Download Speed Import from here and untar it to some directory

    tar -xvzf ~/downloads/speedimport_0.3.tar.gz

    Make sure that current terminal user is owner of OpenERP database table

    Usage

    Go to Speed Import directory and start the server

    ./start.sh

    Go to web broser and enter URL

    http://localhost:8000

    Put your CSV files into one directory

    Enter path to directory into Configuration, for example

    /home/mikasner/documents/emgd_program/produkcija

    Enter OpenERP database name, for example

    openerpdev70

    Save and refresh the page to load CSV files

    Choose appropriate CSV file for Partners, for example partners.csv

    Mapping fields

    It is necessary to map fields from database to CSV columns. We use number for CSV columns from 1 to n.

    a

    Just put number of column that matches the field into textbox and choose CSV radio button

    Permanent fields

    If you want to have values that are the same for all records in CSV then set the value in textbox and choose permanent radio button

    Prepare data

    After you're done with mapping just press Prepare data and it should prepare data form import

    Import

    When preparing of thata is finished press Import and data should be in your database in seconds

    You are free to login to OpenERP and enjoy your newly prepared data

    Have questions? Contact us
